text: "Rocket Man" (officially titled "Rocket Man (I Think It's Going to Be a Long, Long Time)") is a 1972 song by Elton John and is the lead single from his fifth studio album Honky Ch√¢teau. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Ireland and the United States, number 13 in Australia and number 18 in Germany. In 2021, it was used in the Elton John and Dua Lipa single Cold Heart. == References == Category:1972 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Elton John songs Category:Kate Bush songs Category:Little Big Town songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Rocket Man (song)
